title: BL Drama no Shuen ni Narimashita
overview: A popular BL manga was set to be adapted into a live-action drama. The two lead roles were played by Hajime Aoyanagi, a talented actor who used to be a successful child actor but who was not so popular anymore, and Yuichiro Akafuji, who was a popular and handsome actor. Aoyagi had a hard time with Akafuji's casual attitude, but Akafuji, on the other hand, seemed to be seriously in love with Aoyagi. Will the two stars successfully act out their BL drama?Â
